member.name: T:byMarc.Net2.Library.ListItems.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:byMarc.Net2.Library.ListItems.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:byMarc.Net2.Library.ListItems.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:byMarc.Net2.Library.ListItems.ListItemsLib.EnumerationToListItems(System.Type)
member.summary: Builds an array of ListItems from an enumeration. Each enumeration has a name (string) and a value (integer). These components are returned in a list of ListItems because a ListItem has both string and value components.

member.name: M:byMarc.Net2.Library.ListItems.ListItemsLib.ItemExists(byMarc.Net2.Library.ListItems.SelectListItem[],System.String)
member.summary: Returns true, if an array of ListItem objects contains a specific value.
member.param: The list of items to check.
The value to look for in the list of items.

member.name: P:byMarc.Net2.Library.ListItems.SelectListItem.Enabled
member.summary: Returns whether or not this list item is enabled.

member.name: P:byMarc.Net2.Library.ListItems.SelectListItem.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for this list item.

member.name: M:byMarc.Net2.Library.ListItems.SelectListItem.ToString
member.summary: Returns the text that is displayed for this list item.

member.name: P:byMarc.Net2.Library.ListItems.SelectListItem.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that is associated to this list item.
